theme.title: The eighth rest
theme.para: In this lesson we will start introducing the eighth rest in the rhythmic patterns. The first pattern we are going to study is the eighth note followed by an eighth rest:

score.music: (score (vers 1.5) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C) (time 2 4 noVisible) (n a4 e)(r e) (spacer 20) (barline end) )))

part.title: Listen and take notice of the differences
part.para: Note that this rhythm is similar to the quarter notes rhythm, but shortening the notes:

score.music: (score (vers 1.5) (instrument (musicData (clef G)(key C) (time 2 4) (n a4 q)(n a4 q) (spacer 20) (barline) (n a4 e)(r e)(n a4 e)(r e) (spacer 20) (barline end) )))

part.title: Exercises
part.para: Exercise 1 - Train your ear and practise the introduced rhythmic patterns.
Exercise 2 - Read scores containing the rhythms studied in this lesson.
